description:
The Nagarekawa Girls are prepared for the Locodol Festival and are making final adjustments.
Amidst the heat they prepare at city hall, but for some reason they choose to hold their meeting in a room without air conditioning. While they will be appearing on national television, the girls treat it like any other job. As the girls think about sightseeing after the festival, Saori informs them of some very important news...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: On a essayé de rassembler des stars locales
